6.72d: Undid melee hero collision change from 6.72c
6.67: Increased  Vampiric Aura radius from 600 to 900. Reduced  Reincarnation manacost from 100/150/200 to 100 on each level.
6.64: Increased  Vampiric Aura lifesteal from 5%/10%/15%/20% to 10%/16%/22%/28%.
6.01: Reduced attack point from unknown to 0.56.
6.05: Reduced  Mortal Strike crit damage from 150%/200%/250%/300% to 125%/175%/225%/275%.
6.35: Inreased base armor from 0 to 1 (total armor is now 2.82). Reduced  Reincarnation cooldown from 300/240/190 to 300/220/140.
6.12b: Increased  Mortal Strike crit damage from 130%/170%/210%/250% to 125%/175%/225%/275%. Rescaled  Reincarnation manacost from 150/200/250 to 100/200/300.
6.79: Increased base  intelligence from 13 to 18.  Vampiric Aura now also works fully for ranged allied units, instead of being melee only. Removed the active component from  Mortal Strike.  Reincarnation Increased slow from 30% to 50%. Increased slow radius from 700 to 900.
6.78: Added an active component to  Mortal Strike:
6.72c: Melee hero collision size now reduced from 24 to 12.
6.75: Increased  Hellfire Blast slow from 15% to 20%.
6.12: Reduced  Vampiric Aura lifesteal from 10%/15%/20%/25% to 5%/10%/15%/20%. Reduced  Mortal Strike crit damage from 125%/175%/225%/275% to 130%/170%/210%/250%. Increased  Reincarnation manacost from 100 to 150/200/250.
6.73: Reincarnation Increased slow duration from 3 to 4. Reduced cooldown from 300/220/140 to 260/160/60.
6.72: Reincarnation Now applies a 30% movement speed slow for 3 seconds within a 700 radius upon respawning (places a debuff). Reduced delay from 5/4.5/4 to 3.
6.80: Reincarnation Increased slow from 50% to 75%. Increased slow duration from 4 to 5.
6.81: Increased  Mortal Strike crit damage from 125%/175%/225%/275% to 150%/200%/250%/300%. Reduced base armor from 1 to 0 (total armor is now 2.52).
6.84: Added  Aghanim's Scepter upgrade for Wraith King: Adds an aura to  Reincarnation. Allies who are within 1200 radius become Wraiths for 5 seconds when slain, delaying their death. Wraiths can attack, move, use spells and items.
6.20: Reduced  Hellfire Blast damage from 125/175/225/300 to 100/150/200/250.
